enWisdom: Delay [in giving] is one of the two refusals

Wisdom: الْعَطِيَّةُ بَعْدَ الْمَنْعِ أَجْمَلُ مِنَ الْمَنْعِ بَعْدَ الْعَطِيَّةِ
enWisdom: Giving after having refused is more graceful than refusing after having given
The ugliest deed of an honourable person is withholding his contribution

Wisdom: إِنَّ الْمِسْكِينَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ فَمَنْ أَعْطَاهُ فَقَدْ أَعْطَى اللَّهَ وَمَنْ مَنَعَهُ فَقَدْ مَنَعَ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ
enWisdom: Verily, the beggar is a messenger of Allah, so one who gives to him gives to Allah and one who withholds from him, withholds from Allah, the Glorified

Wisdom: إِذَا قَلَّ أَهْلُ الْفَضْلِ هَلَكَ أَهْلُ التَّجَمُّلِ
enWisdom: When the kind people become fewer, those who adorn themselves get ruined
He who holds back from giving has oppressed generosity

Wisdom: لَمْ يُرْزَقِ الْمَالَ مَنْ لَمْ يُنْفِقْهُ
enWisdom: One who does not spend [his] wealth [in the way of Allah] has not been blessed with wealth
One who withholds from giving is deprived of [or prevents] praise

Wisdom: مَنْ هَانَ عَلَيْهِ بَذْلُ الْأَمْوَالِ [الْآمَالِ‏] تَوَجَّهَتْ إِلَيْهِ الْآمَالُ [الْأَمْوَالُ‏]
enWisdom: One who finds it easy to give away [his] wealth has hopes directed towards him

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يَسْمَحْ وَهُوَ مَحْمُودٌ سَمَحَ وَهُوَ مَلُومٌ
enWisdom: One who does not give generously while he is praised has to give away while he is dispraised

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يَجُدْ [لم يحمد] لَمْ يُحْمَدْ
enWisdom: One who does not show generosity is not praised

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يُعْطِ قَاعِداً مُنِعَ قَائِماً
enWisdom: One who does not give while he is sitting [in ease] will be deprived when he is standing [in adversity]

Wisdom: مَنْ مَنَعَ الْمَالَ مَنْ يَحْمَدُهُ وَرَّثَهُ مَنْ لَا يَحْمَدُهُ
enWisdom: Whoever withholds wealth from the one who praises him bequeaths it to one who does not praise him

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يَكُنْ لَهُ سَخَاءٌ وَلَا حَيَاءٌ [حَبَاءٌ] فَالْمَوْتُ خَيْرٌ لَهُ مِنَ الْحَيَاةِ
enWisdom: When there is neither generosity nor shame in a person, then death is better for him than life

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ تَعْرِفِ الْكَرَمَ مِنْ طَبْعِهِ فَلَا تَرْجُهُ
enWisdom: When one is not known to have a generous nature, [then] do not have hope in him

Wisdom: مَا أَكْمَلَ السِّيَادَةَ مَنْ لَمْ يَسْمَحْ
enWisdom: He who does not grant generously has not perfected [his] eminence
